overview:
Managing Partner of VC fund Synergy Innovation, Co-Founder and Board Member of Russian software company Synergy Soft, Vice President of Information Technology at Synergy University.

Dmitry’s business experience began in 1996, as co-founder and Business Director of W3D Group, which specialized in websites and online advertising, swiftly becoming the largest professional design studio in Southern Russia.

Then he went on to RBC (www.rbc.ru)where he worked as a Managing Partner in six businesses – Hosting Center RBC, Mango Telecom, Garant-Park-Telecom, Peterhost, Spaceweb, and Centrohost, managing telecommunications, domains, and web hosting.

Within the last years he has entered the education market with Moscow University of Industry and Finance “Synergy”, where he created Megacampus, distant learning platform which has quickly become the premier platform for e-learning in Russia.
